text:
April 13, 1956
Hr. John Kriebel
106 W. Highland Avenue
Langhome, Pa.
Dear Hr. Kriebelf
Replying to your letter of April 11, Hr. Harold Hill our Associate
Director, who handles matters of this kind, is out of the office
until April 25. Your letter will be called to his attention upon
his return.
Sincerely,
Joanne Youngquist (Hrs.)
